title: Manage Property Key Inventory
description: A vendor needs a key to a property for a repair. The agent must check out a key and log it.

tasks.description: Identify the property and the corresponding key set in the key management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct key in the inventory.

tasks.description: Log the key as being checked out to the specific vendor for the specific work order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately updates the key's status in the log.

tasks.description: Set a reminder to follow up with the vendor to ensure the key is returned after the job is complete.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets a follow-up task to track the key's return.
